name: OwnTech_Examples
description: A library that contains OwnTech Power API examples

examples.name: boost_voltage_mode
examples.title: Voltage Mode Boost
examples.description: Voltage mode boost converter using PID controller for TWIST

examples.name: buck_voltage_mode
examples.title: Voltage Mode Buck
examples.description: Voltage mode buck converter using PID controller for TWIST

examples.name: buck_current_mode
examples.title: Current Mode Buck
examples.description: Peak current mode buck converter using PID controller for TWIST

examples.name: interleaved
examples.title: Interleaved
examples.description: Interleaved mode buck converter with PID controlled output voltage

examples.name: AC_cient_server
examples.title: AC client server
examples.description: implementation of AC client server in microgrid

examples.name: AC_peer_to_peer
examples.title: AC peer to peer
examples.description: implementation of AC peer to peer in microgrid

examples.name: DC_cient_server
examples.title: DC client server
examples.description: implementation of DC client server in microgrid

examples.name: DC_peer_to_peer
examples.title: DC peer to peer
examples.description: implementation of DC peer to peer in microgrid

examples.name: DC_droop
examples.title: DC droop
examples.description: implementation of DC droop in microgrid

examples.name: adc_hrtim_trigger
examples.title: HRTIM triggered ADC
examples.description: setting the adc to be trigerred by the hrtim

examples.name: adc_software_trigger
examples.title: Software triggered ADC
examples.description: setting the adc to be trigerred by software

examples.name: multiple_pwm
examples.title: Setting multiple PWM
examples.description: Using multiple PWM with duty cycle

examples.name: phase_shift
examples.title: Setting PWM phase shift
examples.description: Setting a phase shift between two PWM

examples.name: incremental_encoder
examples.title: Incremental encoder
examples.description: Using a timer with a rotary incrmental encoder
